text.text_translated:
Much business happens across international borders today.
Most business people in the world use English. It is a common language.
But there are small ways of talking in business. What people expect in business communication is also different. This can be very different from culture to culture. Culture means the way a group of people live and think.
If you do not know the cultural ways and rules, problems can happen. This is with people you meet for business.
You might judge people wrongly. You might not understand them. It can cause communication problems.
There are three main parts of business rules. These are different around the world.
Knowing them can help you very much. This is for when you work with people from other cultures.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Much business happens across international borders today.
Most people in business around the world use English. It is a common language.
But people want different things when they talk in business. These things are different in each culture.
If you do not know how people do things in business in different countries, problems can happen.
You might think badly about people. You might not understand them well. People might stop talking well.
There are three main differences in ways to act in business around the world.
Knowing them can help you when you work with people from other cultures.
